pages.text: Obviously, we $(l)all$() need resources. When the Outerlands $(o)(the area outside the build border)$() are available, we encourage you to acquire resources in your preferred method there! $(br2)The Outerlands are reset every 3 months.

pages.title: Alternative Options
pages.text: While they are unavailable, we suggest looking at alternative options such as player built farms on the $(l:patchouli:traveling/nexus#orange_network)Orange Sharestone Network$(/l) found at $(c:/warp nexus)/warp nexus!$(/c)

pages.title: Alternative Options
pages.text: Other alternative options can be found using $(l:patchouli:mods/jei)JEI$()! Some blocks can be crafted via create, using ars essences, or obtained in the market block shown above!
